Package edu.cs3500.spreadsheets.model

Class WorksheetReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs3500.spreadsheets.model.WorksheetReader
  • public final class WorksheetReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for reading inputs and producing Worksheets: given a WorksheetReader.WorksheetBuilder to produce the new Worksheet itself, this class can parse the given input and populate the worksheet.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static <T> T read​(WorksheetReader.WorksheetBuilder<T> builder,
                         java.lang.Readable readable)

        A factory for producing Worksheets. The file format is

           <cell coordinates, in A# format> <the raw contents of the cell>
   ...

        e.g.

           A1 5
   A2 6
   A3 =(SUM A1 A2:A2)

        Line-comments are indicated by #, and are allowed either at the start of a line or between the cell coordinate and its contents.

        There is no requirement that cells are filled in in order of their dependencies, since no cell evaluation occurs during this creation process.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of Worksheet to produce
        Parameters:
        builder - The source of the new Worksheet object
        readable - the input source for the contents of this Worksheet
        Returns:
        the fully-filled-in Worksheet
